sent.orig: He would always avoid danger and tries his best to avoid danger and protect his life.
sent.trans: 他总是躲避危险，极尽全力地保护自己的性命。

sent.orig: Fear of danger is ten thousand times more terrifying than danger itself apparent to the eyes.
sent.trans: 危险的恐惧，实在比我们肉眼看得见的危险本身还要千万倍地使人心惊肉跳。

sent.orig: Without danger we cannot get beyond danger.
It a danger publishers need to recognise a danger for writers as well.
sent.trans: 出版商需要承认有这种风险，对作家而言也是如此。

sent.orig: Danger, danger! an intruder has penetrated our force shell!
sent.trans: 危险，危险！一名入侵者已经攻破了我们的军防！
